summary: A test suite that validates the TensorFlow implementation of the Vision Transformer Masked AutoEncoder (ViTMAE) model, covering its configuration, deterministic behavior, pretraining functionality, forward method signature, handling of input embeddings, saving and loading mechanisms, compatibility with pretrained weights, output consistency, and support for NumPy array inputs.
business_intent: Ensure the TF ViTMAE model works correctly and reliably across various scenarios, providing confidence for developers and users that the model meets quality standards before deployment.
